seo.siteDescription: Gymlib's blog keeps you posted about sport and well-being, but also HR best practices in terms of quality of life at work and employer brand.
seo.siteKeywords: Gymlib, sport, well-being, quality, of, life, work, employer, brand, HR, human, ressources

subscribe.heading: Subscribe

about.heading: About
about.body: Gymlib improves the well-being and health of employees through its sport program and its network of partners: more than 2000 infrastructures and 200 different activities throughout France and Belgium.
